name: Sync (zniq)
description:
Retro graphic shoot'em up.

- Source code will be posted later. (Too dirty)
- Deleted '_simple' in the title, because it was a sentence that meant a prototype.

Left, Right : Move
Z : Shoot
Enter : Start

Created with Game Maker 8.0
Build with GameMaker:Studio 2.2.5.481

Music by Keisei Urasaki (JAP)
